title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat endpoint inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports streaming, embeddings, custom options, and pull/generate APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces and streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting, pulling, and benchmarking Ollama models with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama: generator, embedder, and chat components for retrieval-augmented pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made Docker Compose stacks (CPU, NVIDIA, AMD, Open-WebUI, LiteLLM proxy).

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles for Llama-3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, SQLCoder, and fine-tuned LoRA adapters.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands with per-user quotas and model rotation.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot that adds /ollama slash command and app mentions for private or channel chats.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, generate flashcards, or brainstorm with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: same API as ollama-js but shipped as a lightweight CommonJS/ESM module.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: install via pip and access generate, chat, embed, list, pull, delete APIs.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF question-answering.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing Modelfiles, benchmarks, GPU tweaks, and ecosystem announcements.
